amendment.description: To provide equal access to competitive global prescription medicine prices for American purchasers.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 981 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 31. Record Vote Number: 235.

Amendment SA 981 proposed by Senator Pryor. (consideration: CR S8331-8335, S8341- 8393; text: CR S8331-8332) To provide equal access to competitive global prescription medicine prices for American purchasers.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 981 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66 - 31. Record Vote Number: 235.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 981 proposed by Senator Pryor.
